nodes.text: Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones (junior novelization)

Star Wars Episode II: Attack of the Clones is a Legends junior novel written by Patricia C. Wrede, based on a screenplay by George Lucas and Jonathan Hales. It adapts the film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, and it was first published in paperback by Scholastic on April 23, 2002, prior to the film's release. The novel was collected in Star Wars: Collector's Edition (2005), Star Wars Boxed Set: Episodes I–VI (2007), and Star Wars: Prequel Trilogy (2014).
A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away....
A galaxy is undermined. An army emerges. A love is forbidden. A dark turn approaches.
